translation.en: She decided what to do.
All that needed to be said had been said.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: She enjoyed it.
The trip had been exhausting.
Though she didn't understand before, now she did.
She invited her friend into her house.
translation.tam: Chatha and Terubim, the fire warm.

translation.en: The mouse trap sprung.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: The two sides put aside their differences and worked together towards a common goal.
A wall appeared in their path.
The medicine immediately made him feel better.
She listened in on their conversation.
He became captain of the boat.
Hello.
The two sides were able to broker a deal that met both their needs.
The journey would be demanding.
His spirits were lifted.
He asked that their conflict stop.
She sat there, waiting for him to begin the story.
translation.tam: Kira at court, the court filled.

translation.en: She ate dinner.
She didn't know where to look.
The motor on the boat stopped working.
They were worried about the possibility of imminent danger.
His path was unclear.
A piece of cheese was placed on the mouse trap to lure the mouse.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: The wall barring their path disappeared.
His progress had temporarily stopped.
She found a different way of approaching the problem.
He was very busy.
It was the captain's duty to make these sorts of life and death decisions.
She preferred to work alone, without assistance.
Though they were tired, they continued working.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: In spite of their best intentions, the process did not function correctly.
She was very sleepy.
The children sat in a circle to read the book together.
He refused her gift of the apple.
Though she told him what would happen, he didn't listen.
He found a something that he hadn't expected to see.
She turned on a flashlight, making it easier to see.
She asked him for it again and again, even though he had previously refused.
He required rest.
It didn't occur to her to ask him to help.
She asked if he wanted an apple.
She made steady progress working on the problem.
The injury she sustained hurt greatly.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: No matter what he did, the outcome would be the same.
He helped them.
He asked if she had eaten.
They decided to try a new approach.
He did not understand.
She said it was true.
